resources: V1.0.0 Screen Mirroring Settings Next Previous Previous //splash Loading... Share your image and video to BIG screens Mirror Wifi connected Wifi not connected Browser Mirror Floating tool Connect with Browser On mode Off mode Stop stream Don’t leave this page before connected Connect your devices to the same Wifi and turn off VPN. Open this link on other device to mirror The IP address may change every time you connect. Thus, please make sure each number is entered correctly in the browser address bar. Copied //tutorial screen Tutorial FAQ Connected devices Hello blank fragment //tutorial step 1. Make sure your phone and TV (other adaptable devices) connected to the same Wifi and turn off VPN 2. Enable the “Display” function on your TV. You need to enable it manually on several devices, go to system settings to check. 3. Click to the “Mirror” button, enable the wireless display function on your phone and wait for device searching TVs 4. If finishing all steps, you can’t still connect two of your devices. Then, please check the connected devices. Skip Go Ok Cancel Retry //checking wifi screen Checking wifi Checking\nNetwork Check signal transmission Test connection speed Check the connection distance Select device Download //dialog Open wifi setting Watch short video to unlock browser mirror for free or upgrade to open life time. Close Upgrade //setting Setting Language About Policy Rate Invite Friends Feedback //faq item My smartphone can’t find any device for coupling with. - Ensure the same Wifi connection\n- Turn off VPN\n- Shorten the distance between devices\n- Check supported devices My smartphone gets stuck “connecting” to couple with TV. - Restart the smartphone’s wifi and reconnect to devices.\n- Turn off the TV and unplug it for 1 minute then turn it on again.\n- Shorten the distance between your phone and the TV. My devices could connect before, but those do not work now? If your devices could connect previously, those can be definitely connected again. You may check VPN, the same Wifi, and the distance. You even deal with the problems by restarting your devices. It shows that my device is not supported. What should we do? This means that your device does not support the screen mirroring function.\nYou could find supported devices to be able to mirror TV. Is my personal information or mobile data completely secured? - We always ensure your information on your smartphone and connected devices are confidential. Thus, you can mirror to TV without worry. The pin code will secure your transmission. You can turn it off on theSetting to secure the pin code.
